components.title: Packages tailored to the needs of every school
components.description: PebbleGo offers a unique combination of trusted, engaging content and active learning tools to help students understand the world around them.

components.firstProductDescription: Discover PebbleGo, a trusted online nonfiction research tool with engaging and kid-friendly content.
components.secondProductDescription: Get the ultimate PebbleGo experience. Add tools to enhance discoverability and empower students to show what they know!
